body_html:
I am really sorry. The problem is happening because of mismatch in the shape of filter and strides associated with it to produce the required output shape with padding. I should have set deconvolution filter shape of [1, 1, 3, 3] and strides at [1, 1, 1, 1] with 'VALID' padding. Then the above example would work.

My sincere apologies in wasting the time of developers.

body:
I am really sorry. The problem is happening because of mismatch in the shape of filter and strides associated with it to produce the required output shape with padding. I should have set deconvolution filter shape of [1, 1, 3, 3] and strides at [1, 1, 1, 1] with 'VALID' padding. Then the above example would work.

My sincere apologies in wasting the time of developers.
